body_html:
Oh yeah, also my version needed to have an explicit binary flag "wb"

+++ b/tensorflow/python/training/training_util.py
@@ -67,10 +67,13 @@ def write_graph(graph_def, logdir, name, as_text=True):

   if as_text:
+    f = gfile.FastGFile(path, "w")
     f.write(str(graph_def))
   else:
+    f = gfile.FastGFile(path, "wb")
     f.write(graph_def.SerializeToString())
   f.close()

body:
Oh yeah, also my version needed to have an explicit binary flag "wb"

```
+++ b/tensorflow/python/training/training_util.py
@@ -67,10 +67,13 @@ def write_graph(graph_def, logdir, name, as_text=True):

   if as_text:
+    f = gfile.FastGFile(path, "w")
     f.write(str(graph_def))
   else:
+    f = gfile.FastGFile(path, "wb")
     f.write(graph_def.SerializeToString())
   f.close()
```
